about_the_game: Re-live the romance of "Bahamian Rhapsody" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this romance dating sim visual novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!
detailed_description: Re-live the romance of "Bahamian Rhapsody" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this romance dating sim visual novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 and above
  • Processor: 1.5GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Bahamian Rhapsody Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Re-live the romance of "Bahamian Rhapsody" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this romance dating sim visual novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!
